group_1.textLeft: ...Excellent.

group_1.textRight: Yea?
With how you look, did you...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, with this...the remodeling's finished...!

group_1.textRight: Woah!? It appears it's completed at last!
The Reindeer Santas' Super Reindeer #2 (reworked)!
There was also a message from the observatory...
It said after Nanase and them deliver the@necessary energy,
we can start at any time...!

group_1.textLeft: Really...? That went faster...than I expected.
It was really fortunate...that Library Town's@citizens helped us out.
So that means...
our preparations are complete, and we're ready to begin the operation at any moment!

group_1.textRight: ...Even though things got really blown up this time.

group_1.textLeft: Just what happens when things are on a larger@scale than before.

group_1.textRight: Ain't it like there was a superton of energy so the@tower can't be used?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... To solve this problem,
we're repurposing the observatory discovered@through the shared intelligence.

group_1.textRight: It's great a suitable facility was close by!

group_1.textCenter: Once the energy Nanase's collected is brought@to the observatory...
...we can beam the large amount of energy needed@this time around towards the Wishing Star.

group_1.textRight: With the remodeled Reindeer #2,
we just gotta find a good chance to jump in, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... The necessary adjustments were made to@the motorcycle and okamochi.
If you draw as close to the Wishing Star as possible...
...using the Central Tower...

group_1.textRight: Then afterwards, we can use the transmission@beam...
...to shoot straight through to the other side of the@End of the World, just like that, right!?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... After being struck by the beam,
you'll automatically be disintegrated into individual@bits, smaller than pixels.
You should be able to cross the boundary of the@End of the World...
Since the communication protocol we use should@be the same as in the angels' world,
as long as you can cross the singularity in the boundary...then surely...

group_1.textRight: Can't know whether we can get across that place...
...before we actually do it, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah... With our knowledge...we can't predict@what will happen.

group_1.textRight: I recall...we could be cast off into the void and@erased from existence.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, just as I said before.
...A-Are you really not scared...?

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, that's a good point.
Saying I'm not scared would be a lie, but even so,@I'm willing to believe...
...in the Super Reindeer #2 that Shigure@remodeled for us!

group_1.textLeft: ...Y-Yeah...

group_1.textRight: We've already made up our minds 'bout this,@no point in frettin' now!
Yup yup!

group_1.textLeft: ...@[wait:0.8][chara:103000:motion_200][chara:103000:cheek_0][chara:103000:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:103000:lipSynch_1]Yeah...that's true.

group_1.textRight: All what's left is waitin' for Yukika!

group_1.textLeft: Yup! They should be procuring...
...the necessary energy for us in Candy Town!
